name: Cozy Maze
description:
Description

My first game ever along with my first jam. Just a little maze game with a timer, cubes and capsules. It is also my entry for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam hosted by Firith Studio.

Hope you enjoy it!

Controls

Don't click QUIT (freezes the game, haven't figured out why yet)

WASD : Move your player
Mouse : Move the camera, up-down-left-right
P : Pause the game (also pause the timer)

Goal

The green gate is your start point. Reach the red gate to clear the maze.
10 different mazes.

Special Thanks :
  • https://hereandabove.com/maze/mazeorig.form.html for the amazing maze generator!
  • https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/ for the amazing owl sounds you can hear in the game!

Available for Browser, Windows and Mac (untested for Mac)
